participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and ambitious, Emily is driven by her passion for medicine and supporting her daughter's extraordinary talents.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. my favorite movie is friday. i'm now looking for a new job. i am a doctor.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and somewhat isolated, George finds joy in his unique lifestyle as a bee farmer and cherishes his memories with his Italian supermodel wife.
participant_2.background: i married a super model from italy. my favorite food is papaya. i've zero family that i'm close to. i'm a bee farmer. my name is george.
